google-build-explicit-make-pair.description:
Description

Check that
make_pair
’s template arguments are deduced.

G++ 4.6 in C++11 mode fails badly if
make_pair
’s template arguments are
specified explicitly, and such use isn’t intended in any case.

Corresponding cpplint.py check name:
build/explicit_make_pair
.
google-build-explicit-make-pair.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
